[[Solar TV]] (2009-2011) | former_callsigns = | effective_radiated_power = 15,000 watts| homepage = [http://www.etc.com.ph/ www.etc.com.ph]| }} '''DXWW-TV''', channel 9, is a [[television station]] of [[Philippines|Philippine]] [[television network]] [[Radio Philippines Network]]. Its studios and transmitter are located at Marfori Heights [[Davao City]]. ==Current/past personalities== * [[Remy Baylas]] * [[Edgar Candia]] * [[Ethel Cantor-Constantino]] * [[Jessie Casalda]] * [[Danny Comilang]] * [[Jun Digamon]] * [[Ruth Palo-Dumandan]] * [[June Duterte]] * [[Rudy Encabo]] * [[Mary Ann Geralla]] * [[Aljun Layao]] * [[Erin Lumosbog]] * [[Stephen Manangan]] * [[Richy Nalagon]] * [[Aileen Navarro]] * [[Arlene Ocampo]] * [[Tek Ocampo]] * [[Darius Relatado]] * [[Jinky Rosit-Bargio]] * [[Raul Tolibas]] * [[Rick Torrecampo]] == See also == * [[Radio Philippines Network]] {{Metro Davao TV}} {{RPN Mindanao}} {{Philippines-tv-stub}} [[Category:RPN stations]] [[Category:Television in Davao City]] [[Category:Television channels and stations established in 1961]] [[ceb:DXWW-TV]] [[tl:DXWW-TV]]
